narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
This 1st pre-license inspection and exit briefing for a Class C license were conducted with the applicant.
The applicant will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee to the Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
REGULATED ACTIVITIES CANNOT BE PERFORMED UNTIL AN USDA LICENSE CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN
ISSUED BY THE REGIONAL OFFICE.
